title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a simple CLI and REST API.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull and manage models from Node or the browser.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; supports sync/async generation, chat, embeddings, model pulling and listing.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package providing Ollama LLM, embed and chat wrappers for building RAG & agent pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (now Open WebUI) with chat history, model management, RAG, user auth and plugins.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Community-built interactive CLI wrapper with conversation memory, syntax highlighting and prompt templates.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: Experimental GitHub Copilot-like VS-Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline code suggestions.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG template showing how to combine Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain for private Q&A.

title: ollama-npm
summary: Official npm package for Ollama JavaScript client; 70k+ weekly downloads.

title: ollama PyPI
summary: Official PyPI package for Ollama Python client; 200k+ monthly downloads.

title: ollama4j
summary: Community Java SDK for Ollama with fluent API, POJO mapping and Spring Boot starters.

title: ollama-rs
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to Ollama’s REST API.

title: ollama-discord
summary: Self-host Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models via slash commands.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Official Helm chart for deploying Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU & PVC support.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack Bolt app that bridges channels to Ollama models with mention-triggered threads.

title: ollama-dagger
summary: Dagger module for CI/CD pipelines that spins up Ollama containers and runs model tests.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration providing OllamaGenerator and OllamaEmbedder nodes for RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-streamlit
summary: Starter repo for building Streamlit chat apps backed by Ollama with session memory and voice input.
